entity.name: Roy Cooper
entity.description:
US governor of North Carolina, 
Roy Cooper

text:
@NC_Governor "...this pandemic is a priority". That sums it up. Not massive job loss, not riots and looting... Good news, fatalities continue to significantly fall in the US and globally. 
https://t.co/Fr4Md7bdiQ
